title: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The issue is related to the usage of Class.forName() in the BidiUtil class in the win32 version of org.eclipse.swt.internal package. This line of code throws a NoClassDefFoundError.
EB: The usage of reflection in BidiUtil class should be replaced with direct instantiation of the callback.
SR: To reproduce the bug, try running the CLDC version of SWT in a scenario where the BidiUtil class is invoked. This will cause a NoClassDefFoundError to be thrown.
